name: Nova Caldwell
backstory: A former signal analyst who can read the pulse of a city in a single burst, Cipher now routes Zion's blue channel with ruthless precision.

name: Dante Xu
backstory: Once a black-site infiltrator, Specter walks the data-stream unseen, removing threats before they breach the hull.

name: Alyssa Kade
backstory: Pulse keeps the grid alive with a heartbeat of stolen power, rerouting energy to keep Zion's shields online.

name: Miles Ortega
backstory: An ex-courier who outran machine patrols on the surface, Ghostlink now runs insurgent supply chains through the city's veins.

name: Sage Monroe
backstory: Helix rewrites machine algorithms into protective loops, turning the enemy's logic into Zion's armor.

name: Kieran Holt
backstory: Rift crafts breaches in the Matrix architecture, opening corridors for the rebellion to move unseen.

name: Talia Rivas
backstory: Nyx is a stealth tactician whose strike plans erase machine patrols before they register on radar.

name: Roman Keane
backstory: Vortex maintains the rebel comms array, twisting surveillance signals into actionable intel.

name: Iris Wolfe
backstory: Glitch plants corrupted decoys across the simulation, giving Zion the seconds it needs to strike.

name: Ezra Park
backstory: Arc traces the electromagnetic trail of every sentinel, mapping safe passages through the undercity.

name: Juno Vega
backstory: Echo archives rebel victories and failures alike, turning memory into strategy.

name: Rafael Chen
backstory: Lock is the last defense between Zion and collapse, sealing every breach with clean, precise code.

name: Elara Knox
backstory: Oracle sees the pattern in every anomaly, predicting machine moves before the alarms fire.

name: Vince Arden
backstory: Forge reforges scavenged tech into weapons the machine cannot anticipate.

name: Mira Voss
backstory: Haven maintains the safehouses across the grid, sheltering operatives between runs.

name: Julian Cross
backstory: Cipher decodes enemy transmissions, extracting truths hidden under layers of encryption.

name: Lena Hart
backstory: Ion runs power into Zion's defenses, keeping the blue team arsenal primed for impact.

backstory: Surge is the first strike specialist, disrupting machine cores with surgical bursts.

backstory: Shard manipulates fragmented data trails to misdirect enemy hunters.

name: Silas Ray
backstory: Rook commands the tactical oversight deck, orchestrating multi-cell maneuvers in the dark.

name: Zara Blix
backstory: Sable manipulates shadow channels to keep Zion's strikes invisible to the machine.

name: Noah Drake
backstory: Drift pilots the blue team through unstable corridors, never letting the system lock on.

backstory: Warden enforces the firewall perimeter and knows every access key in the arsenal.

name: Omar Blane
backstory: Vector plots escape routes in real time, steering the team away from machine ambushes.

name: Petra Nyx
backstory: Flux controls the rhythm of the intel feed, ensuring nothing important is lost in the noise.

backstory: Pulse ignites machine cores with a cascade of blue-light counterattacks.

backstory: Cipher holds the insurgent encryption lattice, shielding every signal moving through Zion.

name: Hector Blaze

name: Harper Sloane

name: Mason Holt

name: Nadia Vale
backstory: Oracle can smell a machine trap in the wind and reroute the team before the ambush closes.

name: Orion Blake

name: Reese Kade
backstory: Slate wipes the last trace of a run clean, leaving the machine blind to the team's presence.
